summary: Two awaken on Earth with no recollection of their past and embark on a devastating crime spree but are sent to an infamous lunar penitentiary named Dead Leaves.
cast: Kappei Yamaguchi|Takako Honda|Yûko Mizutani|Mitsuo Iwata|Kiyoyuki Yanada|Nobuo Tobita|Wataru Takagi|Masami Iwasaki|Yasuyuki Kase|Eiji Takemoto|Hidenobu Kiuchi|Takeshi Maeda|Masakazu Suzuki|Tarusuke Shingaki|Hiroshi Shimozaki|Mika Otake|Yumiko Nakajima|Kerry Anderson|Keith Burgess|Chad Fifer|Stephen Kruiser|Jason Lee|Hal Lublin|Jason Charles Miller|Stephen Millunzi|Michael Ross|Douglas Rye|Amanda Winn Lee
title: Deddo ribusu
